Posts.Content: Roxie43 wrote: I wasn't sure where to post. I've been crying for two days now. My doctors tell me that I'm stage 4 because of cancer in a right lymph node ( my primary cancer was on my left side). I never cried this much when I was diagnosed. I'm not sure what's going on. I went thru chemo, radiation, and ovary removal over the past year. I thought I handled things OK up until now. This is the first time I have posted. Does anyone feel the same way? Like incredibly sad? Dx 9/5/2012, IDC, 1cm, Stage IV, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: I'm crying all the time Roxie43 Kjones13

Posts.Content: Dec 5, 2013 03:46PM Roxie43 wrote: Thank you so much! I was feeling so alone! I'm taking effexor xr and my doctor recently increased the dosage. I was so OK with my diagnosis and my treatment. Until the past couple of days.
Posts.Title: I'm crying all the time Roxie43 Kjones13
